Method.name: OnPage
Method.Implementation: $$$VAR Set job = %session.SessionId Quit:$$$ISERR(..validaSessao()) $$$OK Set method = $Get(%request.Data("method",1)) Xecute "do .."_method_"()" Quit $$$OK

Method.name: validaSessao
getDados
Method.Implementation:
; $$$VAR Set YM = 0 Set Y = "~" ; Set codCID = $Get(%request.Data("codCID",1)) ; Set arrayRetorno = [] Kill temp ; Set meuSQL = "Select * From SQLUser.VARPEPPremiumTratamento " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Where Company= 0 And CID = '"_codCID_"' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Group By CodigodoPaciente, CodigodoTratamento " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Order By CodigodoPaciente, DatadoIniciodoCiclo " Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSQL) Set codPaciente = "" While(rSet.%Next()){ If ($$GetDescRegimeTerapeutico^VARSQL(codCID, rSet.%Get("CodigodoTratamento")) = "") Continue If (codPaciente '= rSet.%Get("CodigodoPaciente")) { Set count = 0 Set codPaciente = rSet.%Get("CodigodoPaciente") } Set temp($Increment(count)) = $Get(temp(count)) + 1 Set temp(count, rSet.%Get("CodigodoTratamento")) = $Get(temp(count, rSet.%Get("CodigodoTratamento"))) + 1 } ; Set qtdeDiv = $Order(temp(""),-1) Set:qtdeDiv>0 qtdeDiv = (qtdeDiv\3)+$Select(qtdeDiv#3>0:1,1:0) Set linTrat = "" ; Write "
" Write "
" For div = 1 : 1 : qtdeDiv{ Write "
" Write "
" Set qtdeLinhaTrat = 0 For { Set linTrat = $Order(temp(linTrat)) Quit:linTrat="" ; kill temp1 Set codTrat="" For { Set codTrat = $Order(temp(linTrat, codTrat)) Quit:codTrat="" Set qtde = temp(linTrat, codTrat) Set temp1(qtde, codTrat) = "" } Set arrayDados = [] Set qtde = "", countQtde = 0 For { Set qtde = $Order(temp1(qtde),-1) Quit:qtde=""||(countQtde>=5) Set codTrat = "" For { Set codTrat = $Order(temp1(qtde, codTrat)) Quit:codTrat=""||(countQtde>=5) Set desc = $$GetDescRegimeTerapeutico^VARSQL(codCID, codTrat) If (desc="") Continue Set list = {} Set list.name = $Extract(desc,1,13)_$Select($Length(desc)>13:"...",1:"") Set list.desc = desc Set list.codTrat = codTrat Set list.linTrat = linTrat Set list.y = qtde Do arrayDados.%Push(list) Set countQtde = countQtde + 1 } } ; Write "
" Write "
" Write "
" Quit:$Increment(qtdeLinhaTrat)=3 } Write "
" Write "
" } Write "
" Write "" Write "" Write "Previous" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "
" ; Return $$$OK

Method.name: GetDetalhe
Method.Implementation: $$$VAR Set YM = 0 Set Y = "~" ; Set codCID = $Get(%request.Data("codCID",1)) Set pCodTrat = $Get(%request.Data("codTrat",1)) Set linhaTrat = $Get(%request.Data("linhaTrat",1)) ; Set arrayRetorno = [] Kill temp ; Set meuSQL = "Select * From SQLUser.VARPEPPremiumTratamento " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Where Company= 0 And CID = '"_codCID_"' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Group By CodigodoPaciente, CodigodoTratamento " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Order By CodigodoPaciente, DatadoIniciodoCiclo " Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSQL) Set codPaciente = "" While(rSet.%Next()){ If ($$GetDescRegimeTerapeutico^VARSQL(codCID, rSet.%Get("CodigodoTratamento")) = "") Continue If (codPaciente '= rSet.%Get("CodigodoPaciente")) { Set count = 0 Set codPaciente = rSet.%Get("CodigodoPaciente") } Set temp($Increment(count)) = $Get(temp(count)) + 1 Set temp(count, rSet.%Get("CodigodoTratamento"), codPaciente) = "" } ; Set codPaciente = "" For { Set codPaciente = $Order(temp(linhaTrat, pCodTrat, codPaciente)) Quit:codPaciente="" ; Set topConsulta = "" &SQL( Select Max(NumerodaFicha) Into :topConsulta From SQLUser.VARPEPPremiumTratamento Where Company = 0 And CID = :codCID And CodigodoPaciente = :codPaciente And CodigodoTratamento = :pCodTrat ) Set meuSQL = "Select * From SQLUser.VARPEPPremiumTratamento " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Where Company= 0 And CID = '"_codCID_"' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "And CodigodoPaciente = '"_codPaciente_"' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "And CodigodoTratamento = '"_pCodTrat_"' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "And NumerodaFicha = '"_topConsulta_"' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "And IndicadordeCicloConcluido = 1 " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Order By NumerodoCiclo " Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSQL) While(rSet.%Next()){ if (rSet.%Get("DatadoFinaldoCiclo")=""||(rSet.%Get("DatadoIniciodoCiclo")="")) Continue Set qtdeDias = rSet.%Get("DatadoFinaldoCiclo") - rSet.%Get("DatadoIniciodoCiclo") Set temp(linhaTrat, pCodTrat, codPaciente) = temp(linhaTrat, pCodTrat, codPaciente) + qtdeDias } } ; Kill temp1 Set codPaciente = "" For { Set codPaciente = $Order(temp(linhaTrat, pCodTrat, codPaciente)) Quit:codPaciente="" ; Set qtde = +temp(linhaTrat, pCodTrat, codPaciente) Set temp1(qtde, codPaciente) = "" } ; Set aCategoria = [] Set aSerie = [] Set qtde = "" Set count = 0 For { Set qtde = $Order(temp1(qtde)) Quit:qtde="" Set codPaciente = "" For { Set codPaciente = $Order(temp1(qtde, codPaciente)) Quit:codPaciente="" Do aCategoria.%Push("Paciente "_$Increment(count)) Do aSerie.%Push(qtde) } } Set listRetorno = {} Set listRetorno.categoria = aCategoria Set listRetorno.serie = aSerie Do listRetorno.%ToJSON() ; Return $$$OK
